CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 28, 1958, page A11, reads: "For Outstanding Service as secretary to Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity for 30 consecutive years, Atty. Wilbur Douglas was presented a scroll of appreciation during intermission att he [at the] Alpha formal, Friday, at Hotel Webster Hall. Charles Angell, president of Alpha Omicron Lambda Graduate Chapter, made the presentation. He is surrounded by Forrest Parr, William Nicholson, James Simmons, Dr. Roosevelt Richardson, Charles Cuthbert, Morris Fountain, Clifford McPherson, Harry Thorton, H. D. Primas Sr., George Mason, the Rev. Leroy Patrick, Howard Hairston, Dr. Robert Bolden, Gaines Bradford, Henry D. McCullough and Dr. Max Johnson."
TitMainTitle: Wilbur Douglas holding scroll and standing at microphone with Charles Angell, surrounded by group including Forrest Parr, William Nicholson, James Simmons, Dr. Roosevelt Richardson, Charles Cuthbert, Morris Fountain Sr., Clifford McPherson, Harry Thorton, H. D. Primas Sr., George Mason, Rev. Leroy Patrick, Howard Hairston, Dr. Robert Bolden, Gaines Bradford, Henry D. McCullough, and Dr. Max Johnson, gathered in Georgian ballroom of Hotel Webster Hall for Alpha Phi Alpha 30th Anniversary ball
